txt_en: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
txt_cn: 你不主宰时光，时光就会主宰你。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
txt_cn: 我们可能会遭遇许多失败，但绝不能被它们击败。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
txt_cn: 我相信每个人的心跳次数有限，所以我不想浪费任何一下。
author: Neil Armstrong

txt_en: Problems are guidelines, not stop signs!
txt_cn: 问题不是止步的信号，而是前进的指引。
author: Robert H. Schuller

txt_en: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
txt_cn: 对身体最好的治疗就是让头脑安静。
author: Napoléon

txt_en: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
txt_cn: 想要成就一番事业，不仅要行动，还要敢于梦想；不仅要做计划，还要抱有信念。
author: Anatole France

txt_en: Be not simply good — be good for something.
txt_cn: 不要一味地善良，要有原则地善良。
author: Thoreau

txt_en: Don't bother just to be better than others. Try to be better than yourself.
txt_cn: 不要为了比别人强而烦恼，要努力比自己强。
author: William Faulkner
